WorkItem.ClosedComment: Google how to download latest .NET for your OS
WorkItem.Description: I recently downloaded Rawr after hearing about it from some friends. I am really excited to use it, but every time i click the Rawr exe. an error message comes up and says " To run this application, you first must install one of the following versions of the .NET framework:v4.0.30319 contact your  application publisher for instructions about obtaining the appropriate version of the .NET framework" I cant find any version that is 4.0.30... If anyone can help me it would be greatly appreciated  thank you

Comments.Message:
System Requirements
For Use

.NET Framework v4.0
Windows 2000, XP, 2003, Vista, 2008, or 7
Silverlight 4.0.50826.0 Runtime (or newer)

This is listed on the right of the documentation tab.  So, just get the latest version of .NET Framework v4.  Also make sure you install the latest Silverlight 4.
Once you have done that I suggest reading through the documentation tab, especially "http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=WhereToStart"
